title: This City Is Expanding Its CCTV Network Despite Being Among Safest
content: Hong Kong's police force is taking on a campaign to install thousands of surveillance cameras across the city to ramp up their crime-fighting capabilities.
summary: Hong Kong's police force is taking on a campaign to install thousands of surveillance cameras across the city to ramp up their crime-fighting capabilities.

title: Opinion: You Got An iPhone, Now Think Of 'Envy Imperialism'
content: Apple's iPhone's rapid global penetration of the global mobile sector is incumbent mainly not so much on the end users marvelling at its technological leaps but on their ability to flaunt it as a possession.
summary: Apple's iPhone's rapid global penetration of the global mobile sector is incumbent mainly not so much on the end users marvelling at its technological leaps but on their ability to flaunt it as a possession.

title: Imran Khan's Party Leader "Invites" S Jaishankar To Join Protests In Pak
content: Imran Khan's party leaders have been staging protests, claiming that the Pakistan government should adhere to the constitution.
summary: Imran Khan's party leaders have been staging protests, claiming that the Pakistan government should adhere to the constitution.

title: Watch: Viral Pygmy Hippo 'Moo Deng' Stuns Internet With 'Moonwalk'
content: Known for her attention-seeking antics, Moo Deng has now captivated international audiences with her latest viral performance: a moonwalk reminiscent of Michael Jackson's iconic dance move.
summary: Known for her attention-seeking antics, Moo Deng has now captivated international audiences with her latest viral performance: a moonwalk reminiscent of Michael Jackson's iconic dance move.

title: Elon Musk Changes X Display Picture To Show Support For Donald Trump
content: Billionaire Elon Musk has changed his X display picture to show his public support for Republican US Presidential candidate Donald Trump.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk has changed his X display picture to show his public support for Republican US Presidential candidate Donald Trump.

title: Too Hot For Beach Visit? Dubai's Floodlit Beaches Are A Hit At Night
content: Roasted by summer temperatures too hot for the beach, Dubai has turned to an innovative solution: opening them at night, complete with floodlights and lifeguards carrying night-vision binoculars.
summary: Roasted by summer temperatures too hot for the beach, Dubai has turned to an innovative solution: opening them at night, complete with floodlights and lifeguards carrying night-vision binoculars.

title: Donald Trump's "Guts" Bring Him Back To The Site Of Failed Assassination
content: Supporters knelt and others bowed their heads as Donald Trump led a moment of silence at 6:11 pm, the time when shots rang out at a rally in the same rural Pennsylvania showground exactly 12 weeks earlier.
summary: Supporters knelt and others bowed their heads as Donald Trump led a moment of silence at 6:11 pm, the time when shots rang out at a rally in the same rural Pennsylvania showground exactly 12 weeks earlier.

title: Israeli Airstrikes Hit Beirut, Hezbollah Heir Apparent Missing: 10 Points
content: Israeli airstrikes hit southern Beirut late Saturday night, with Lebanese media reporting particularly violent strikes lasting into early Sunday morning.
summary: Israeli airstrikes hit southern Beirut late Saturday night, with Lebanese media reporting particularly violent strikes lasting into early Sunday morning.

title: Massive Israeli Strikes Hit South Beirut, Sparking Flashes Seen
content: Massive consecutive strikes hit Beirut's southern suburbs from late Saturday into Sunday, Reuters eyewitnesses said, sending booms across the city and sparking flashes of red and white for nearly 30 minutes visible from several kilometers away.
summary: Massive consecutive strikes hit Beirut's southern suburbs from late Saturday into Sunday, Reuters eyewitnesses said, sending booms across the city and sparking flashes of red and white for nearly 30 minutes visible from several kilometers away.

title: UK Robber Breaks Into Home, Cooks Meal For Victim, Hangs Clothes To Dry
content: A burglar broke into a womans home in the UK and decided to feel at home and finish several household chores including cooking, cleaning and hanging out washed clothes.
summary: A burglar broke into a womans home in the UK and decided to feel at home and finish several household chores including cooking, cleaning and hanging out washed clothes.

title: "Shame On Them": Netanyahu As Macron Calls For Halt On Arms Deliveries
content: "I think that today, the priority is that we return to a political solution, that we stop delivering weapons to fight in Gaza," Emmanuel Macron told French broadcaster France Inter.
summary: "I think that today, the priority is that we return to a political solution, that we stop delivering weapons to fight in Gaza," Emmanuel Macron told French broadcaster France Inter.

title: End "Shocking Violence", Says UN Chief On Hamas Attack Anniversary
content: The UN secretary-general denounced Hamas and called for an immediate end to the "shocking violence and bloodshed" in Gaza and Lebanon in a statement Saturday ahead of the anniversary of the Palestinian group's October 7 attack.
summary: The UN secretary-general denounced Hamas and called for an immediate end to the "shocking violence and bloodshed" in Gaza and Lebanon in a statement Saturday ahead of the anniversary of the Palestinian group's October 7 attack.

title: "If Donald Trump Doesn't Win....": Elon Musk Joins Ex US President On Stage
content: Donald Trump was shot in the ear when he was addressing a rally in Pennsylvania's Butler on July 13.
summary: Donald Trump was shot in the ear when he was addressing a rally in Pennsylvania's Butler on July 13.

title: Thousands March For Ceasefire Ahead Of Israel-Hamas War Anniversary
content: Thousands of protesters marched in cities around the world on Saturday calling for a ceasefire in Gaza and Lebanon as the war in the Palestinian territory neared the one-year mark.
summary: Thousands of protesters marched in cities around the world on Saturday calling for a ceasefire in Gaza and Lebanon as the war in the Palestinian territory neared the one-year mark.

title: Highly-Skilled Chinese Hackers Infiltrated Multiple US Telecom Firms
content: A group of highly skilled Chinese hackers linked to the Chinese government successfully infiltrated multiple US telecommunications firms in the last few months, CNN reported.
summary: A group of highly skilled Chinese hackers linked to the Chinese government successfully infiltrated multiple US telecommunications firms in the last few months, CNN reported.

title: A Year Of Devastation: Israel On Alert Ahead Of Hamas Attack Anniversary
content: Israel placed its forces on alert Saturday ahead of the anniversary of Hamas's October 7 attack, after a military official said the country was preparing its retaliation for Iran's missile attack.
summary: Israel placed its forces on alert Saturday ahead of the anniversary of Hamas's October 7 attack, after a military official said the country was preparing its retaliation for Iran's missile attack.

title: 75 New Zealand Sailors Rescued From Shipwreck Off Samoa
content: New Zealand said Sunday it had rescued all 75 sailors from a navy vessel that ran aground and sank off Samoa while conducting a reef survey.
summary: New Zealand said Sunday it had rescued all 75 sailors from a navy vessel that ran aground and sank off Samoa while conducting a reef survey.

title: Iran Threatens Of "Even Stronger" Retaliation To Any Israeli Attack
content: Tehran's top diplomat in Damascus on Saturday threatened an "even stronger" reaction to any aggression, as Israel readied its response to an Iranian missile attack earlier this week.
summary: Tehran's top diplomat in Damascus on Saturday threatened an "even stronger" reaction to any aggression, as Israel readied its response to an Iranian missile attack earlier this week.

title: This City Has Been Voted World's Best, Per Readers' Choice Awards 2024
content: Sydney has been named the world's best city in a survey conducted by Conde Nast Traveller. The top-10 global cities rankings are part of the publication's annual Readers' Choice Awards for 2024, which launched on October 1 in the UK.
summary: Sydney has been named the world's best city in a survey conducted by Conde Nast Traveller. The top-10 global cities rankings are part of the publication's annual Readers' Choice Awards for 2024, which launched on October 1 in the UK.

title: Greta Thunberg Detained In Brussels For Blocking Road During Protest
content: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was among dozens of protesters detained Saturday for blocking a road in the Belgian capital at a demonstration against fossil fuel subsidies.
summary: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was among dozens of protesters detained Saturday for blocking a road in the Belgian capital at a demonstration against fossil fuel subsidies.
